title: Moving the operator argument to the front for kernelPointwiseApply.
body_html: Currently on PyTorch AMD, memory accesses on the TensorInfo struct contained in the Operators passed into the kernelPointwiseApply kernel leads to hangs on the HCC runtime. Permuting the argument order such that the operator is first alleviates this issue and the kernel hangs disappear.
body_text: Currently on PyTorch AMD, memory accesses on the TensorInfo struct contained in the Operators passed into the kernelPointwiseApply kernel leads to hangs on the HCC runtime. Permuting the argument order such that the operator is first alleviates this issue and the kernel hangs disappear.
body: Currently on PyTorch AMD, memory accesses on the TensorInfo struct contained in the Operators passed into the kernelPointwiseApply kernel leads to hangs on the HCC runtime. Permuting the argument order such that the operator is first alleviates this issue and the kernel hangs disappear.
